about_the_game:
Neon Chrome Original Soundtrack by the talented composer Jonathan Geer is a collection of unique, powerful and atmospheric retro synth music. We've made the OST DLC available as per the request of our beloved beta testers who fell in love with the music.

Tracks Listing

1) Neon Chrome
2) Death is Your Destination
3) Cybernetic
4) Distributed Processing
5) Do Singularities Dream
6) Elite Hacker
7) Enhanced and Improved
8) Killzone
9) Monopoly on Violence
10) Overseer
11) Protecting the Empire

+ ambient bonus track.

All tracks available in both flac and ogg.
